meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Morgan Barbara Sheridan Helen Juvonen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6526.

td.p: John Morgan, an elementary school art teacher from Charlotte, North Carolina
Barbara Sheridan, an attorney and law clerk to a judge from Yonkers, New York
Helen Juvonen, an actor from Toronto, Canada (whose 2-day cash winnings total $57,202)

tr.td: FILL THE PRESCRIPTION
"T" TIME
SWANS
RUNNING INTO THE FURNITURE TERMS
TV THEME SONGS
TABLE OF CONTENTS
